title: Ocean week points
body: So ive played a few games now, and have done "20hp" dmg in the boss thingo, is hp the same as a point in which do i meet the 20 point req for the hextech stuff at the end??

replies.body: Yep! That is correct, you've earned 20 points (of damage) to the monster - and you'll receive the reward, assuming the last battle is successful!
Ummm that's the 10 points one, the 20 points one is the one that happens no matter what.
